title: Riot Gifted me A Summoner Icon??`
body: I just randomly got this? I've been playing dark star singularity recently, so does that have anything to do with it?

replies.body: This is the Cosmic Ruins icon, which is given for reaching 33 kills in the[ Dark Star game mode](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/learn-more-about-dark-star-2017).  Congrats!
Will there be more summoner icons for getting more kills than 33? Or just this one?

For more than 33 kills?  I don't think so.  I don't believe there are additional in-game icon rewards beyond what's in the [announcement ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/learn-more-about-dark-star-2017)page.  Good luck!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Mjww5GWh,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-05-06T16:31:21.499+0000)
>
> This is the Cosmic Ruins icon, which is given for reaching 33 kills in the[ Dark Star game mode](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/learn-more-about-dark-star-2017).  Congrats!

Oh. Thanks! :D
